metadata.name: The Female Dance 01
metadata.description:
Edition: 1/1
Series: The Female Dance – a blessing and a burden.

With graceful movements she dances through her world – excellence and societal expectations in complex symbiosis, and inner battle.

The work elevates the woman in a contemporary culture where she moves skilfully in all possible situations. An orchestration of qualities and communication with a historical impact on expectations, in parallel with contemporary influences – a strength and blessing, at the same time a burden.

A dedication to her who calls herself a woman.

4K MP4 (2160x2160px)
16 sec infinity loop.
24 MB.
Music specially composed by Fredrik Mjelle (Beem).
50% of the profit will be donated to the women of Ukraine.

Extra:
- A large acrylic physical video print of the work as an infinite loop without audio. ( 8.4 x 5.8 x 1 inc // 15 x 21.5 x 2.5cm)
- A 4K TV screen landscape format of the work (2160 x 1080 px)
- Unique and signed physical limited prints will be sent to any persons bidding over the reserve.
